Succour Magical Servant.Target: One of your Familiars or Constructs

Bind Monstrous Beast.Ingredients: The skull or hide from the same species as the beast being bound

Bind Spirit Within Power Stone.Type: Any Lore of the Eight Winds
Bind Spirit Within Power Stone.Ingredients: A Power Stone and a Minor Elemental (or similar spirit)

Carve Ogham Stone.Ingredients: A large piece of granite shot through with veins of quartz. The stone should be around six feet in height and a foot in breadth, or larger.

Create Power Stone.Type: Any Lore of the Eight Winds

Conjuration of the Bloody Hidesman.Ingredients: A constructed totem comprised of the bones and freshly flensed pelts from eight or more large animals.

Conjuration of the Incarnate Elemental o.Ingredients: An hourglass filled with sand made from the powdered bones of a monarch.

Conjuration of Jack O’ Cinders.Ingredients: A colossal pyre must be constructed and kept ablaze whilst the ritual is in progress.

Create Construct.Ingredients: A suitable form for the construct to inhabit

Create Familiar.Ingredients: A suitable vessel for the familiar

Dark Cursecraft.Type: Lroe of Witchcraft, Daemonology, Necromancy, or any Chaos Lore

Imbue Staff.Type: Any Lore of the Eight Winds
Imbue Staff.Ingredients: A quarterstaff or metal rod of similar length

Invocate Daemon.Ingredients: At least one of the names the Daemon uses. The invoker must also cause significant mayhem, suffering, or death during the ritual

Materialise the Living Swamp.Type: Lore of Death, Lore of Life, Lore of Shadows, Lore of Hedgecraft, Lore of Witchcraft
Materialise the Living Swamp.Ingredients: A heartstone and access to a suitable quantity of organic matter.

The Crossed Scythes.Ingredients: No ingredients, though the caster requires the tools with which to create the carving.
